'''Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr.''' (born 20 November 1942) is an [[United States|American]] politician, currently serving as the senior Senator from [[Delaware]]. 

== Presidential campaigns ==
He ran as a Democratic presidential candidate for the 1988 presidential election, but lost to [[Michael Dukakis]]. He seeked nomination from the Democratic Party for the 2008 presidential election but dropped out on 3 January 2008 after the Iowa caucus. In August 2008, Biden was chosen by [[Barack Obama]] to be his running mate. On November 4, 2008, Biden was elected Vice President.
